Title: Omerta, la loi du silence
Actors: Michel Côté, Luc Picard, Dino Tavarone
Plot: Gilbert Tanguay, the director of the anti-crime squad, hires two men to catch the head of Montreal's Mafia, Giuseppe Scarfo. One, Pierre Gauthier, is going to lead the investigation, and the other, François Pelletier, is going to ...
